author: James Tait
description: Delicately laced with light rum, it's zesty, silky smooth and easy.
name: Don Daisy
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
